pr_title: update features for internal use of Jakarta Connectors API

timeline.bodyText: This corrects a mistake in a previous delivery.  The inclusion of this bundle vs the jakarta version of it is done by the autofeature, and should not be here in the main jcaSecurity feature.
timeline.author: njr-11

timeline.message: Issue #11771 update features for internal use of Jakarta Connectors API
Issue #11771 update features for internal use of Jakarta Connectors API
Issue #11771 version-specific jdbc bundles need jakarta transformation, too

timeline.bodyText: Copyright header needs to be updated.
timeline.author: nmittles
timeline.diffHunk:
